Skill.label: Optional CA Bossing Setup (Use Alongside TR)

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Build Updates:
Harvest Changes: - Many chaos nodes on the skill tree & in cluster jewels have been altered. This has resulted in a slight DPS loss but most has been made up with optimizations to the skill tree and Cluster Jewels.
Cluster Tree Changes: - Method to Madness & a jewel socket have been dropped. - Expanded our second cluster jewel setup to include additional medium and small cluster jewels. - Many Cluster Jewel notables have been swapped around and optimized.
Other Tree Changes: - Early and Midgame trees have been improved. - No Witnesses has been picked up. - Wind Dancer has also been allocated to further improve our defenses.
Gear Changes: - Our Anointment has changed to Exceptional Performance to account for some of the lost Skill Effect Duration. You can also choose to keep Corruption though this will only significantly improve boss damage with high amounts of Wither stacks.
